_header: Have mind upon thy king how he the water wept

CamMagPep2125.First Lines:
Haf mynde vpon þi kyng how he þe water wepteþat
                    is þi dere swetyng and how his blod he swette…
CamMagPep2125.Last Lines:
…Þu bryng me to þat placeihesu my der
                    swetyngWher y may se þi face& alwey be dwellyng
CamMagPep2125.Note: Written two lines of verse per line of MS.
